title: Customize a Private Tour
description: A client wants to create a custom full-day private tour of London, including the Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, and a specific pub for lunch.

tasks.description: Gather the list of desired stops and the date for the private tour.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all required locations and the date.

tasks.description: Check the feasibility of the itinerary, including travel times and attraction opening hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the itinerary is possible within a full day.

tasks.description: Price the custom private tour, including guide, transportation, and entry fees, and present it to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a detailed quote for the customized tour.
